title: Extra: Behind the Scenes At Kavanaugh Hearing
itunes:title: Extra: Behind the Scenes At Kavanaugh Hearing
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli discusses what happened behind the scenes during the Brett Kavanaugh and Christine Blasey Ford hearing with Mike Davis, former chief counsel for Senate Judiciary Committee nominations including Justices Gorsuch and Kavanaugh. Davis is also a former Senior Adviser to Senator Grassley and Law Clerk to Justice Gorsuch on the Supreme Court.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
